title: Person perception identify elements of experiment

content.prompt: Which of the following explains why this research study is an experiment?

choices.label: The researcher manipulated the independent variable.
The researcher manipulated the dependent variable.
The researcher used inferential statistics to draw their conclusions.
The researcher used a sample to generalize to a population.

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
